sentence: The leaves turn orange in autumn, which provides for some beautiful scenery.
sentence_tra: 这些树叶在秋天变成橘黄色，平添了许多美景。

mean_cn: n. 午夜, 半夜;  adj. 半夜的;
sentence: Lights out by midnight! I mean it!
sentence_tra: 大半夜的把灯关了！我是说真的！

sentence: I have to attend an important fund-raising event this week.
sentence_tra: 这周我有一个很重要的筹款活动（事件）要参加。

sentence: The kindergarten had many toys for children to play with.
sentence_tra: 幼儿园有很多玩具供孩子们玩。

sentence: My brother jumped out of the closet and frightened me.
sentence_tra: 我的弟弟从衣柜里跳出来，吓到我了。

mean_cn: phr. 穿上; 陷入, 染上(习惯); 对…有兴趣;
sentence: All the children are really getting into the Harry Potter books.
sentence_tra: 所有的孩子都对哈利波特系列书很感兴趣。

mean_cn: v.上车（飞机，船），进展，使前进
sentence: Let's get on the airplane!
sentence_tra: 我们登机吧！

sentence: I bought this flag as a souvenir on my trip.
sentence_tra: 我在旅途中买了这面旗子作为纪念品。

sentence: We took a helicopter ride over the sea.
sentence_tra: 我们搭乘直升机飞过大海。

mean_cn: phr. (飞机)起飞;  拿掉;  取消;   脱衣;
sentence: The airplane takes off.
sentence_tra: 飞机起飞了。

mean_cn: adj.被抛弃了的，被遗弃了的，被放弃了的；放荡的，堕落的
sentence: The abandoned building was spooky and full of debris.
sentence_tra: 这座废弃的建筑令人毛骨悚然，满地的碎片。

sentence: The big, heavy phone is out of date.
sentence_tra: 又大又笨重的手机已经过时了。

sentence: I use my vacuum cleaner to clean the carpet.
sentence_tra: 我用吸尘器打扫地毯。

mean_cn: n. 鹰; 鹰状标志; 少击两棒入穴的成绩;  vt. 比标准杆数少击两杆入;
sentence: The eagle is a national symbol of the United States.
sentence_tra: 是美国的象征。

sentence: We should admit our mistakes and learn from them.
sentence_tra: 我们应该承认自己的错误并从中吸取教训。

sentence: He answered too many questions incorrectly and failed the exam.
sentence_tra: 他答错了太多题目，没能通过考试。

mean_cn: adv. 直接地;  立即, 马上;  靠近地;
sentence: \u201cYes sir, I'll be there immediately!\u201d
sentence_tra: "好的，我马上到！"

sentence: The twins always dress similarly.
sentence_tra: 双胞胎总是穿得很像。

sentence: Make sure to tie your shoelaces or else you might trip and fall.
sentence_tra: 你要确保把鞋带系好，否则可能绊到摔跤。

sentence: Please wear formal clothes to the event--don't embarrass me again!
sentence_tra: 请穿正装来参加宴会，别再让我难堪了！

mean_cn: adj.严肃的；严重的，危急的；认真的
sentence: Why so serious? Lighten up, smile more!
sentence_tra: 怎么如此严肃？高兴起来，多笑笑！

sentence: They hate each other.
sentence_tra: 他们憎恨彼此。

mean_cn: adj. 有趣的；好玩的；引人发笑的
sentence: We laughed at her amusing story.
sentence_tra: 我们被她有趣的故事逗乐了。

sentence: Be very careful when doing scientific experiments.
sentence_tra: 做科学实验时一定要小心。

mean_cn: n.波浪，(挥手)示意，起伏v.(挥手)示意，波动，飘动波浪
sentence: The waves are very big in this part of the ocean.
sentence_tra: 在海上的这个区域波浪很大。

mean_cn: adj. 严格的;  严厉的;  严守的;  严密的;  严谨的;  绝对的;  精心的;  详细的;
sentence: Our teacher is very strict against cheating so he watches us closely.
sentence_tra: 咱老师反作弊非常严厉（名捕啊），他把我们看得好紧。

sentence: I've lost all my hair - I'm completely bald!
sentence_tra: 我头发已经掉完了，我彻底秃顶了！

sentence: Please give me the timetable for the flights.
sentence_tra: 请给我航班时刻表。

sentence: The newborn baby would fall asleep after having some warm milk.
sentence_tra: 新生儿喝些温牛奶后就会睡着。

sentence: Our headmistress is giving us a speech.
sentence_tra: 我们的女校长正在给我们演讲。

sentence: I don't think I studied enough for the exam. I'm feeling very nervous about it.
sentence_tra: 我觉得这个考试我准备得还不够，我还是感觉很紧张。

sentence: The headmaster runs our school with an iron fist.
sentence_tra: 我们校长靠着铁拳政策领导着我们的学校。

sentence: Stop making so many revisions to my book--you're ruining it!
sentence_tra: 不要再在我的书上做那么多修改了！你在摧残它！

sentence: She's been avoiding my calls all week; I don't know why she doesn't want to talk.
sentence_tra: 她这一周都没接我的电话，我不知道她为什么不想和我说话。

sentence: The husband and wife had a very close relationship.
sentence_tra: 丈夫和妻子有很亲密的关系。

sentence: Each class period was one hour.
sentence_tra: 每节课的时间是一小时。

mean_cn: adj. 放松的, 松懈的;  从容的, 不受拘束的;
sentence: Sitting by the ocean makes me feel relaxed and calm.
sentence_tra: 坐在海边让我感到放松而平静。

sentence: She gets shy around boys that she likes.
sentence_tra: 在喜欢的男孩面前她变得很害羞。

sentence: Can you suggest a topic for the Business Studies paper I have to finish this week?
sentence_tra: 你能给我这周就要完成的商业研究报告建议一个话题吗？

mean_cn: n.摘要，总结adj.扼要的，立即的，快捷的
sentence: Could you please give a short summary of your project?
sentence_tra: 你能给我一个你计划的概括吗？

mean_cn: n. 纪律；学科；训练v. 训练
sentence: Military discipline requires you to stand still and look straight ahead.
sentence_tra: 军事训练要求你站得笔直还要目视前方。

sentence: She can do very difficult math--what an intelligent girl!
sentence_tra: 她能解出非常难的数学题，真是个聪明的女孩儿！

sentence: Please revise your paper - it needs some corrections and improvements.
sentence_tra: 请修改你的论文，它有很多需要改进的地方。

sentence: As a result of eating too much fast food, I got really fat.
sentence_tra: 吃了太多快餐食品，让我长得非常胖。

mean_cn: n.印记，印象，感觉，感想，压痕
sentence: I think I made a good first impression when I met him at the park.
sentence_tra: 我想当我在公园遇到他时给了他一个很好的第一印象。

mean_cn: n. 翻译;  译本;  转变;  调任;
sentence: I'm looking for a good translation of some  Chinese poems.
sentence_tra: 我在寻找一些翻译得较好的中文诗。

mean_cn: v. 尊敬，敬重n. 敬重，尊敬；方面
sentence: Japanese people show respect by bowing.
sentence_tra: 日本人通过鞠躬来表达尊重。

mean_cn: n.病人，患者adj.有耐心的，能忍耐的
sentence: As a nurse, I love to work closely with my patients.
sentence_tra: 作为一个护士，我喜欢近距离和我的病人们接触（工作）。

sentence: It's an old joke, but every time I hear it, I can't stop laughing!
sentence_tra: 这是个老笑话了，但每次听到它，我还是笑得停不下来。

sentence: Some ancient sailors believed the earth was flat - in fact, of course, it's round.
sentence_tra: 古时候一些航海员认为地球是平的。而事实上它是圆的。

sentence: Western literature comes in many different languages.
sentence_tra: 西方文学有许多不同的语言。

mean_cn: n. 休假,  假期;  vi. 休假, 度假;
sentence: We spent most of our vacation swimming in the pool.
sentence_tra: 假期的大部分时间我们都在游泳池里游泳。

mean_cn: adj.精力充沛的，充满活力的；有力的，积极的
sentence: I am an energetic runner.
sentence_tra: 我是个精力充沛的跑步者。

mean_cn: vi. 增值;  vt. 赏识;  为…表示感激;  领会;  使增值;
sentence: He appreciated a spoof painting, but he didn't realize that.
sentence_tra: 他没有意识到这是一幅恶搞图，还很欣赏它。

mean_cn: adj. 令人失望的；令人扫兴的v. 令人失望；辜负…的期望
sentence: Your rude behavior is disappointing.

mean_cn: n. 系统; 体制; 身体;
sentence: I'm building a computer system.
sentence_tra: 我正在建一个计算机系统。

sentence: The sunrise is so amazing!
sentence_tra: 日出美得惊人！

sentence: The pizza is divided into many pieces, but I'm going to be eating all of them.
sentence_tra: 披萨被分成了很多块，但我要把它们吃光。

sentence: The Internet is my main source of information about other countries.
sentence_tra: 因特网是我获取其他国家信息的主要来源。

sentence: I hate it when the alarm goes off at the start of my day.
sentence_tra: 我讨厌大清早的闹钟叫声。

sentence: Sichuan is a province of China.
sentence_tra: 四川是中国的一个省份。

sentence: He was disappointed that his favorite football team lost.
sentence_tra: 他很失望，因为他最喜欢的足球队输了。

mean_cn: n. 理解, 领悟;  理解力;  内涵;
sentence: The big question mark implies his poor comprehension.
sentence_tra: 这个大大的问号表明他理解力不够。

sentence: Someday, I want to achieve a high level of English fluency!
sentence_tra: 有一天，我想达到高水平的英文流利程度。

mean_cn: n. 姿势;  态度;  意见;
sentence: The waiter has such a bad attitude!
sentence_tra: 这个服务生态度真够差的！

sentence: She was amazed at the size of the diamond, but she didn't really want to marry him.
sentence_tra: 她被钻石的尺寸惊到了，但她不想嫁给他。

sentence: Her clothes make her body seem to disappear against the wall.
sentence_tra: 她的衣服让她的身体好像消失在墙里一般。

mean_cn: adj. 无聊的, 无趣的, 烦人的;
sentence: How can you be bored by something as interesting as ancient history?
sentence_tra: 古代历史这么有趣，你怎么会觉得无聊呢？

sentence: Teenagers love to play video games.
sentence_tra: 青少年喜欢玩电动游戏。

sentence: The magician impressed the audience with his amazing tricks.
sentence_tra: 这位魔术师用他惊人的伎俩给观众留下了深刻的印象。

mean_cn: adj.尴尬的，窘迫的，觉得难堪的
sentence: He was so embarrassed about farting around so many people.
sentence_tra: 当着这么多人放屁，他非常尴尬。

mean_cn: n: 学者;  adj: (综合大学中的)学院的, 学术的;
sentence: Academic jobs are not always well paid, but they're very satisfying.
sentence_tra: 虽然学术工作收入不高，但是让人很满足。

mean_cn: n. 享受, 享有;  乐趣;  愉快;
sentence: I feel so much enjoyment when I spend time with my son.
sentence_tra: 和儿子一起的时候，我感到很愉快。

sentence: I will not tolerate this bad behaviour in my classroom!
sentence_tra: 我不能容忍这种不良行为在我的教室里！

sentence: The food, service, and atmosphere of the restaurant were terrible. In other words, it was unsatisfactory.
sentence_tra: 这家饭店的食物、服务和环境都很糟糕。换句话说，就是不满意。

sentence: Press this button to go back to the previous page.
sentence_tra: 按这个按钮，回到上一页。

sentence: This is the correct method for washing your hands.
sentence_tra: 这是正确的洗手方法。

sentence: I asked for help from my assistant.
sentence_tra: 我向我的助手寻求帮助。

sentence: Technology is progressing at a rapid pace.
sentence_tra: 科技发展日新月异。

sentence: The company website is up and running.
sentence_tra: 公司网站上线并开始运行。

sentence: We go to college in hopes of a better future.
sentence_tra: 我们上大学是为了一个更美好的未来。

mean_cn: adj.明亮的，卓越的，有才气的；聪颖的
sentence: The little girl is brilliant; she is already doing college level math.
sentence_tra: 这个小女孩很聪明，她已经会做大学难度的数学题了。

mean_cn: n. 误解, 误会;  不和;
sentence: "I'm not a snake; this is a misunderstanding!"
sentence_tra: 我不是蛇，这是个误会！

sentence: The teacher gave me lots of instruction to  improve my English.
sentence_tra: 老师给了我很多指导来提高我的英语。

sentence: I used an eraser to make corrections to my homework.
sentence_tra: 我用橡皮来改正作业。

mean_cn: n. 毕业文凭;  奖状;  vt. 发给…毕业文凭;
sentence: After four years of hard work, I finally got my college diploma.
sentence_tra: 经过四年的辛勤努力，我终于拿到了大学毕业证。

sentence: The pregnant woman looks forward to having her baby.
sentence_tra: 这个怀孕的女人期待着生下孩子。

sentence: The cheerleaders did everything they could to give the team some encouragement.
sentence_tra: 拉拉队队长竭尽所能来给这个队伍加油打气！

sentence: Could you please give me a description of these graphs?
sentence_tra: 你能给我描述一下这些图表吗？

sentence: She stayed to watch the credits at the end of the movie.
sentence_tra: 电影结束后她留了下来看了演职员表。

sentence: Having a truck was convenient during my move to my new apartment.
sentence_tra: 有卡车，搬家很方便。

mean_cn: v.盖住；包括，掩护；通过；占地n.盖子；封面
sentence: I don't use my swimming pool in the winter , so I cover it.
sentence_tra: 冬季我不用游泳池，所以我把它盖上。

mean_cn: adj. 使人尴尬的；令人为难的
sentence: "You ought to be ashamed of yourself!" Well, that's embarrassing...
sentence_tra: “你应该感到羞愧！”呃，这确实挺尴尬的……

mean_cn: adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的
sentence: He's always so enthusiastic about video games--he loves them so much.
sentence_tra: 他对电子游戏总是充满热情，他非常喜欢游戏！
